pack

protected java.lang.String pack(MessageType messageType,
                                java.lang.Object data,
                                java.lang.String messageID)
Packs a data object into a HL7 XML string.

Parameters:
messageType - type of message we are packing - see
data - object containing data to be packed into the message
messageID - code to put into this message to identify it
Returns:
the packed XML in a string
